config_files.docker-compose.yml:
version: '3.0'
services:
  jobs-managing-service:
    build:
      context: jobs-managing-service
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    image: jobs-managing-service:latest
    depends_on:
      - rabbitmq
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
    volumes:
      - ./.data/:/.data/
    networks:
      - basilisk

  benchmark-service:
    build:
      context: benchmark-service
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    image: benchmark-service:latest
    depends_on:
      - rabbitmq
      - fuseki
    ports:
      - "8082:8082"
    volumes:
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
      - /data/iguana-configs:/iguana-configs
      - /data/benchmarks:/benchmarks
      - /data/datasets:/datasets
    networks:
      - basilisk

  rabbitmq:
    image: rabbitmq:management
    ports:
      - "5672:5672"
      - "15672:15672"
    networks:
      - basilisk

  fuseki:
    image: fuseki
    command: "--tdb2 --update --loc databases/results /results"
    ports:
      - "3030:3030"
    volumes:
      - /data/logs/fuseki:/fuseki/logs
      - /data/databases/fuseki:/fuseki/databases
    networks:
      - basilisk

networks:
  basilisk:
config_files.benchmark-service/Dockerfile:
FROM openjdk:17-jdk-alpine
MAINTAINER dice-research.org

RUN apk --no-cache add curl

RUN wget https://github.com/dice-group/IGUANA/releases/download/v3.3.0/iguana-3.3.0.zip && \
    unzip iguana-3.3.0.zip

COPY target/benchmark-service-0.1.jar benchmark-service-0.1.jar
ENTRYPOINT ["java", "-jar", "/benchmark-service-0.1.jar"]
